data.name: Dreams with Furry
data.detailed_description:
ADD TO WISHLIST


About the Game

Dreams with Furry

Dreams with Furry is a collection of short stories featuring Furry Girls and Match 3 gameplay. Cleopatra, Mulan and Joan of Arc are now furry girls! Embark on an exciting journey through different historical periods! Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere. Contains mini-stories about various professions with furry girls

A classic Match 3 game, but at the heart of the game is an advanced dialogue system and a story set in an alternate universe.

Features:

  • 30 levels
  • 3 Lovely Furry Girls
  • 3 in a row
  • Historical horror
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • Cute atmosphere

data.short_description: Dreams with Furry  - Cleopatra, Mulan and Joan of Arc are now furry girls! Relaxing gameplay, cute atmosphere and historical horror.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: May contain situations where the characters are posing in a sexual manner
